Text: ট্রেন্ড ধরুন! সোশ্যাল মিডিয়ায় আপনি কি ট্রেন্ড ফলো করবেন? বন্ধুরা বলে, ভিডিও বানাও। মজা: আপনি কি ট্রেন্ডি নাকি পুরনো? এখন দেখুন!

Text: মজার ভিডিও পাঠান! বন্ধুদের সাথে আপনি কি মজার ভিডিও শেয়ার করবেন? হাসি না হলে গ্রুপ চুপচাপ। মজা: আপনি কি কৌতুকবাজ? এখন পাঠান!
Target: Send funny videos! Sharing funny clips with friends? No laughs, group’s dead. Fun: You a comedian? Send now or bore the crew!

Text: দ্রুত ডেলিভারি চান! খাবার অর্ডারে আপনি কি তাড়াতাড়ি চান? অ্যাপ ধীর, কিন্তু পেট দ্রুত খালি। বন্ধুরা বলে, ফোন করো। এখন অর্ডার করুন!
Target: Want fast delivery! Ordering food quick? App’s slow, but your stomach’s in a rush. Friends say call them. Order now or starve like a drama queen!

Text: পার্সেলের খবর নিন! অনলাইন কেনায় আপনি কি ট্র্যাক করছেন? দেরি হলে কেনার আনন্দ নষ্ট। বন্ধুরা বলে, চেক করো। এখন খোঁজ করুন!
Target: Check parcel status! Tracking your online buy? Late delivery ruins the joy. Friends say check it. Hunt now or it’s gone forever!

Text: ইন্টারনেট ঠিক করুন! ইন্টারনেট বন্ধ, আপনি কি আটকে গেছেন? ভিডিও স্ট্রিমিং মরে গেছে। বন্ধুরা বলে, রাউটার রিস্টার্ট করো। এখন ঠিক করুন!
Target: Fix the internet! Internet’s down, you stuck? Video streaming’s dead. Friends say restart the router. Fix now or go prehistoric!

Text: অর্ডার বাতিল করুন! ভুল খাবার এলে আপনি কি বাতিল করবেন? ঠান্ডা খাবারে মজা নেই। বন্ধুরা বলে, তাড়াতাড়ি বলো। এখন বাতিল করুন!
Target: Cancel the order! Wrong food arrived, canceling it? Cold food’s no fun. Friends say speak up quick. Cancel now or eat a mistake!

Text: অতিরিক্ত সস দিন! অর্ডারে আপনি কি বাড়তি সস চান? খাবার ফিকে হলে হতাশা। বন্ধুরা বলে, জোরে চাও। এখন যোগ করুন!
Target: Add extra sauce! Want extra sauce with your order? Bland food’s a letdown. Friends say demand it loud. Add now or eat disappointment!

Text: পড়াশোনা শুরু করুন! পরীক্ষার জন্য আপনি কি পড়া শুরু করেছেন? বই ধুলোয় পড়ে আছে। বন্ধুরা বলে, তাড়াতাড়ি পড়ো। এখন শুরু করুন!
Target: Start studying! Ready for the exam? Books are gathering dust. Friends say study quick. Start now or crash and burn!

Text: উপস্থাপনা তৈরি করুন! মিটিংয়ে আপনি কি তৈরি হবেন? স্লাইড খালি, বন্ধুরা বলে, ঠিক করো। বস অপেক্ষায়, তাড়াতাড়ি! এখন প্রস্তুত করুন!
Target: Prep the presentation! Ready for the meeting? Slides are blank, friends say fix it. Boss is waiting, hurry! Prep now or bomb it!

Text: ডেডলাইন দেখুন! প্রজেক্টের ডেডলাইন আপনি কি জানেন? বিশৃঙ্খলা শুরু, বন্ধুরা বলে, ক্যালেন্ডার দেখো। মা বলে, পরিকল্পনা করো। এখন ট্র্যাক করুন!
Target: Check the deadline! Know your project deadline? Chaos is brewing, friends say check the calendar. Mom says plan it. Track now or drown in panic!

Text: রিপোর্ট জমা দিন! আপনি কি রিপোর্ট তৈরি করেছেন? বস রেগে গেলে সমস্যা। বন্ধুরা বলে, শেষ করো। এখন জমা দিন!
Target: Submit the report! Got the report ready? Angry boss means trouble. Friends say finish it. Submit now or face the wrath!

Text: মিটিংয়ে কথা বলুন! অফিস মিটিংয়ে আপনি কি কথা বলবেন? বন্ধুরা বলে, মুখ খোলো, না হলে চুপচাপ রাজা। বস ইনপুট চায়। এখন বলুন!
Target: Speak in the meeting! Talking in the office meeting? Friends say open your mouth, or you’re the silent king. Boss wants input. Speak now or stay a mute statue!

Text: Apni kemon achen? I was waiting for your call since morning. Ajke apnar schedule khub tight chhilo na?
Target: How are you? I was waiting for your call since morning. Wasn’t your schedule very tight today?

Text: Apni please ek cup cha banaben? Amar matha khub dukhchhe, I really need some tea. Ajke din-ta onek hectic chhilo.
Target: Could you please make a cup of tea? My head hurts a lot, I really need some tea. Today was a very hectic day.

Text: Apni ki ajke bazar e gechhilen? I forgot to buy vegetables. If you did, then I’ll not go again.
Target: Did you go to the market today? I forgot to buy vegetables. If you did, then I won’t go again.

Text: Kalke apnar office kemon chhilo? So many meetings ek shathe thaka really stressful hoy. Apni ki time peyechhilen lunch korte?
Target: How was your office yesterday? Having so many meetings together is really stressful. Did you get time to have lunch?

Text: Apni please light ta off kore deben? I can’t sleep with too much light. Amar chokh-e problem hocchhe.
Target: Could you please switch off the light? I can’t sleep with too much light. It’s troubling my eyes.

Text: Apni ajke late kore ashlhen keno? I was worried, karon phone-o uthchhilen na. Sab thik ache তো?
Target: Why did you come late today? I was worried because you weren’t picking up the phone either. Is everything okay?

Text: Apni dinner kheyechen? I was thinking to order something from outside, jodi apnar mon thake. Nahole ami khabar banabo.
Target: Have you had dinner? I was thinking to order something from outside if you feel like it. Otherwise, I’ll cook.

Text: Apni ajke amar sathe cholben hospital e? Doctor bolechhen abar check-up korte hobe. It won’t take long.
Target: Will you come with me to the hospital today? The doctor said I need to do a check-up again. It won’t take long.

Text: Apni ki shunechhen kalke brishti hobe? If it rains, amar class ta cancel hoye jete pare. Then I’ll stay home.
Target: Have you heard it will rain tomorrow? If it rains, my class might get canceled. Then I’ll stay home.

Text: Apni ekto fan ta on kore deben? Amar ghore khub garom lagchhe. Without fan, thaka impossible.
Target: Could you please turn on the fan? It’s very hot in my room. Without the fan, it’s impossible to stay.

Text: Apni kemon achen? Ajke office theke ashte deri holo amar. Evening e ekhane boshle bhalo laglo.
Target: How are you? Today I was late coming from the office. It feels good sitting here in the evening.

Text: Ajke khub rush chhilo rasta te, apni jaben bole ami extra time niye ber hoyechilam. Apnar meeting kemon holo?
Target: The road was very busy today, I left early because you were coming. How was your meeting?

Text: Apni coffee khaben, naki ami cha banai? Ami cha banale shobai usually enjoy kore.
Target: Will you have coffee, or should I make tea? When I make tea, everyone usually enjoys it.

Text: Kalke apnar barite electricity chhilo na, na? Ami shunlam pura area te load-shedding hoyechhilo.
Target: Yesterday you didn’t have electricity at home, right? I heard there was load-shedding in the whole area.

Text: Apni kalke doctor dekhechhilen? Ami chhilo na tai jiggesh korte parini. Report ta thik ache?
Target: Did you see the doctor yesterday? I wasn’t there so couldn’t ask. Is the report okay?

Text: Ajker khabar apnar bhalo legechhilo? Amar mone hoy spices ekto beshi hoye gechhilo.
Target: Did you like today’s food? I think the spices were a bit too much.

Text: Apni ajke onek tired mone hochhen. Office e pressure chhilo beshi?
Target: You look very tired today. Was there too much pressure at the office?

Text: Kalke jeta holo seta unexpected chhilo. Apni thakle situation ta better handle hoto.
Target: What happened yesterday was unexpected. If you were there, the situation would have been handled better.

Text: Apni ekhono TV dekhchen? Kalke khela ta miss korechhilen to. Ajke ar miss korben na.
Target: Are you still watching TV? Yesterday you missed the match. Don’t miss it today.

Text: Ami khub din dhore apnar sathe ekta kotha share korte chachhilam. Apnar time hole bolbo.
Target: I have been wanting to share something with you for a long time. I’ll tell you when you have time.

Text: Apnar bacchara school e kemon korche? Last time result khub valo chhilo.
Target: How are your children doing in school? Last time their results were really good.

Text: Ajke khub barsha hocche. Apni bari phirben kivabe? Umbrella niyechhen তো?
Target: It’s raining heavily today. How will you return home? Did you take an umbrella?

Text: Apni onek din dhore ekta trip plan kortesen bole shunlam. Kothay jete ichchhe korchhe?
Target: I heard you’ve been planning a trip for a long time. Where would you like to go?

Text: Apni amar email ta check korben? Deadline ta khub close hoye aschhe.
Target: Will you please check my email? The deadline is approaching quickly.

Text: Apnar sathe ajke kotha bole amar stress komlo. Apni shotti valo listener.
Target: Talking to you today reduced my stress. You’re really a good listener.

Text: Apni onek din dhore ekta book recommend korben bolechhilen. Title ta mone ache?
Target: You had said you would recommend a book for me. Do you remember the title?

Text: Kal apni program attend korte parlen na. Sabai apnar jonno wait korchhilo.
Target: You couldn’t attend the program yesterday. Everyone was waiting for you.

Text: Apni ki ajke raat e khabar barite banaben naki baire khaben? Ami confused.
Target: Will you cook dinner at home today or eat outside? I’m confused.

Text: Apni jokhon office e thakben, amar file ta sign kore diben? Ami kalke collect korbo.
Target: When you’re at the office, can you sign my file? I’ll collect it tomorrow.

Text: Apni ajke onek calm mone hochhen. Meditation koren regularly?
Target: You seem very calm today. Do you meditate regularly?

Text: Apnar phone ta bar bar silent hoye jacche. Kichhu issue ache?
Target: Your phone keeps going silent again and again. Is there some issue?

Text: Apni raat e khub late ghumate jan. Health er jonno eta bhalo na.
Target: You go to sleep very late at night. That’s not good for your health.

Text: Apni amar sathe regularly walk korle valo hoto. Ami motivation pai.
Target: It would be good if you walked with me regularly. I get motivated.

Text: Apni kalke ekta movie dekhechhilen bolechhilen. Kemon chhilo movie ta?
Target: You said you watched a movie yesterday. How was it?

Text: Apnar sathe kotha bolle amar din ta valo hoye jai. Apnar smile onek positive.
Target: Talking to you makes my day better. Your smile is very positive.

Text: Apni office e lunch skip korlen? Eta healthy na. Next time khub careful hoben.
Target: Did you skip lunch at the office? That’s not healthy. Please be careful next time.

Text: Apni amar sathe ekbar exhibition e cholen. Amra dujone enjoy korbo.
Target: Come with me to the exhibition once. We’ll both enjoy.

Text: Apnar suggestion amar jonne onek helpful chhilo. Ami follow korbo.
Target: Your suggestion was very helpful for me. I’ll follow it.

Text: Ajke apnar dress ta onek elegant lagchhe. Color ta apnar sathe perfect.
Target: Today your dress looks very elegant. The color suits you perfectly.

Text: Apni ajke onek busy thakben, tai ami disturb korbo na. Just ekta message pathabo.
Target: You’ll be busy today, so I won’t disturb you. I’ll just send one message.

Text: Apnar sathe childhood memory share korte bhalo lage. Apni khub nostalgic hoye jan.
Target: I enjoy sharing childhood memories with you. You become very nostalgic.

Text: Apni jokhon chhilen na, shobai apnake miss korchhilo. Ami especially khub feel korechhi.
Target: When you weren’t there, everyone missed you. I especially felt it a lot.

Text: Apni ki raat e book poren? Amar mone hoy eita ekta bhalo habit.
Target: Do you read books at night? I think it’s a very good habit.

Text: Apnar bari te cha khete ekta special feel hoy. Atmosphere ta onek friendly.
Target: Having tea at your home feels special. The atmosphere is very friendly.

Text: Apni amar kichhu kaj complete korte help korben? Ami akela parchi na.
Target: Will you help me complete some work? I can’t do it alone.

Text: Apnar voice ta khub clear. Public speaking e apni easily inspire korte parben.
Target: Your voice is very clear. You can easily inspire people in public speaking.

Text: Apni ajke new recipe try korlen? Smell ta khub fresh lagchhe.
Target: Did you try a new recipe today? It smells really fresh.

Text: Apni amar sathe ekdin park e boshe gossip korben? Oitai amar relax time.
Target: Will you sit in the park with me one day and gossip? That’s my relaxation time.

Text: Apni amar opinion respect koren bole amar confidence bare. Eta onek important.
Target: Because you respect my opinion, my confidence grows. That’s very important.

Text: Ajke pura din apnar sathe kotha bolar ichchhe korchhilo. Finally ekhono chance pelam.
Target: All day I wanted to talk to you. Finally, I got the chance now.

Text: Apni onek shomoy family er sathe busy thaken, but amar sathe ekto share korben.
Target: You are often busy with family, but share a little time with me.

Text: Apnar handwriting khub shundor. Amar mone hoy apni calligraphy korte parben.
Target: Your handwriting is very beautiful. I think you could do calligraphy.

Text: Apni amar sathe ekdin library jaben? Amar ekta book khub dorkar.
Target: Will you go to the library with me one day? I really need a book.

Text: Apni jokhon class e asen, pura environment ta alive hoye jai.
Target: When you come to class, the whole environment becomes alive.

Text: Apni ajke amar kachhe ekta boro help korechhen. Ami kibhabe repay korbo?
Target: Today you helped me a lot. How can I repay you?

Text: Apni amar message instantly reply koren bole khub bhalo lage.
Target: I like it very much that you instantly reply to my messages.

Text: Apnar ekta chhobi amar dorkar, official purpose er jonno. Pathate parben?
Target: I need a photo of yours for an official purpose. Can you send it?

Text: Apni amar sathe ekbar rooftop e bose dinner korben? Atmosphere ta romantic hobe.
Target: Will you have dinner with me once on the rooftop? The atmosphere will be romantic.

Text: Apnar smile ta onek stress komiye dey. Amar kachhe eta therapy moto.
Target: Your smile reduces a lot of stress. For me, it’s like therapy.

Text: কালকে meeting এ অনেক দেরি হয়ে গেল, তাই আজকে একটু early ঘুমাতে চাই। Phone টা please silent করে দিন।
Target: Yesterday’s meeting went on too late, so today I want to sleep a bit early. Please put my phone on silent.

Text: আপনি কি জানেন আজকে office এ lunch break টা একটু short হবে? তাই আমি quick কিছু খেয়ে আবার কাজে join করবো।
Target: Do you know today’s lunch break at the office will be a little short? So I’ll eat something quick and rejoin work.

Text: আজ সকালে laptop টা suddenly hang হয়ে গেল, তাই presentation এ একটু problem হলো। কিন্তু আমি backup file দিয়ে manage করেছি।
Target: This morning the laptop suddenly hanged, so there was a small problem in the presentation. But I managed with the backup file.

Text: আজকে weather টা এত hot ছিল যে বাইরে ১০ মিনিট দাঁড়ালেই ঘেমে যাচ্ছিলাম। Water bottle টা সাথে রাখা একদম জরুরি।
Target: Today the weather was so hot that even standing outside for 10 minutes made me sweat. Keeping a water bottle with me was absolutely necessary.

Text: আজ office থেকে বাসায় ফিরতে অনেক late হয়ে গেল কারণ traffic খুব heavy ছিল। বাসায় গিয়ে শুধু একটু rest নিতে মন চাইছিল।
Target: Today it got very late to return home from the office because the traffic was so heavy. At home I just wanted to take some rest.

Text: আপনি যদি documents গুলো আগে check করতেন, তাহলে problem এতটা বড় হতো না। এখন সেগুলো urgently correct করতে হবে।
Target: If you had checked the documents earlier, the problem wouldn’t have been this big. Now they have to be corrected urgently.

Text: কালকে আমি একটা new café তে গেলাম, coffee টা honestly খুব ভালো লেগেছে। Next time আমরা সবাই একসাথে যেতে পারি।
Target: Yesterday I went to a new café, and honestly, I liked the coffee very much. Next time we can all go together.

Text: আজ সকালে phone এ alarm বাজলেও আমি ignore করে ঘুমিয়ে গিয়েছিলাম। ফলে office এ পৌঁছাতে একটু দেরি হলো।
Target: This morning even though the alarm rang on my phone, I ignored it and kept sleeping. As a result, I reached the office a bit late.

Text: আজকে আমি একটা interesting article পড়লাম AI নিয়ে। Technology টা খুব fast grow করছে, একটু scaryও লাগে।
Target: Today I read an interesting article about AI. The technology is growing very fast, and it feels a little scary too.

Text: আপনি কি আজকে evening এ free থাকবেন? যদি থাকেন, তাহলে আমরা একটা small get-together plan করতে পারি।
Target: Will you be free this evening? If yes, then we can plan a small get-together.

Text: আজ সকালে আমার internet connection বারবার drop হচ্ছিল। তাই important email টা send করতে দেরি হলো।
Target: This morning my internet connection kept dropping. So it got late to send the important email.

Text: আজকে আমি library থেকে নতুন একটা book issue করেছি। Book টা দেখতে বেশ informative মনে হচ্ছে।
Target: Today I issued a new book from the library. It seems quite informative.

Text: গতকালকে বাসায় electricity দুইবার চলে গিয়েছিল। UPS থাকায় কাজ চালিয়ে নিতে পেরেছি।
Target: Yesterday electricity went off twice at home. Luckily, I could continue working because of the UPS.

Text: আজ সকালে আমি new recipe try করলাম। Result টা এত ভালো হলো যে সবাই খেয়ে খুশি হয়েছে।
Target: This morning I tried a new recipe. The result was so good that everyone was happy after eating.

Text: আজকের presentation টা অনেক ভালো হয়েছে কারণ আপনি আগে থেকে nicely prepare করেছিলেন। সবাই খুব impressed হয়েছে।
Target: Today’s presentation went really well because you prepared nicely in advance. Everyone was very impressed.

Text: আজকে আমি একটা new app install করলাম phone এ। Features গুলো খুব useful লাগছে।
Target: Today I installed a new app on my phone. The features seem very useful.

Text: আজ সকালে road এ একটা ছোট accident দেখলাম। Luckily কেউ খুব serious injured হয়নি।
Target: This morning I saw a small accident on the road. Luckily no one was seriously injured.

Text: আজকে আমি একটা new movie দেখলাম। Story টা খুব emotional ছিল, শেষ scene এ চোখে পানি এসে গেল।
Target: Today I watched a new movie. The story was very emotional, and in the last scene, I almost cried.
